text: Master of the World can refer to: *Master of the World (novel), a 1904 novel by Jules Verne **Master of the World (1961 film), a film loosely connected to the novel *Master of the World (1934 film), a German science fiction film *Master of the World (comics), a Marvel comics character ==See also== *Masters of the World, a government simulation game by Eversim
title: Master of the World
